read_files <- function(file, year){
  read_excel(file) %>% 
    mutate(year = year)
}

DI_Aces_2021 <- read_files("raw_data/Division I/NCAA Aces Per Set 2020-21.xlsx", 2020)

DI_Aces_1920 <- read_files("raw_data/Division I/NCAA Aces Per Set 2019-20.xlsx", 2019)
